definition: A term used to describe something that is foreign, unusual, or originating from a distant or tropical region. It is commonly employed to refer to objects, places, or experiences that are perceived as unique, unfamiliar, or out of the ordinary.

examples.german: Der Zoo hat viele exotische Tiere.
examples.english: The zoo has many exotic animals.
She likes to wear exotic clothing.

examples.german: Das Hotel bietet exotische Cocktails an.
Er hat eine exotische Pflanze in seinem Garten.
examples.english: He has an exotic plant in his garden.
